questions.question: / did / Where / go / you / last weekend / ? /
questions.answer: Where did you go last weekend?

questions.question: / you / go / When / did / to / the movies / ? /
questions.answer: When did you go to the movies?

questions.question: / computer game / He / a / buy / didn't / . /
questions.answer: He didn't buy a computer game.

questions.question: will How be you old Spring next?
questions.answer: How old will you be next Spring?

questions.Instruccion: We all get angry sometimes. How you act make the situation better or worse. Here are some ideas about how to control your anger. If you star to feel angry... Unscramble the words.

questions.question: picture / draw / a / anger / you / of
questions.answer: Draw a picture of your anger.

questions.question: favorite music / sing along / your / with
questions.answer: Sing along with your favorite music.

questions.question: a friend / can / you / trust /talk to
questions.answer: Talk to a friend you can trust.

questions.question: permit / don't / your anger / to take control
questions.answer: Don't permit your anger to take control.

questions.question: want / you / if / to / more / learn / about / anger control / on the internet / read
questions.answer: If you want to learn more about anger control read on the internet.
